class.name: UtilityAIBTParallel
class.brief_description: Ticks all its child nodes. If any of the nodes returns failure (-1) or running (0), the parallel node returns it back to its parent.
class.description: The parallel node ticks all its child nodes. If any of the nodes returns failure (-1) or running (0), the parallel node returns it back to its parent. If the child nodes return both failure and running statuses, the running status is returned to the parent node.
